r2 -a puce ../extract/system/P6FWR4.1 

Resident firmware

each microinstruction is two bytes
0000-5a00 = ca. 24K

0000-2D00 in word addr
8800-B500 i.e. in if loaded at 8800
B500-C000 = ca 4.5K

RAM firmware = 8800-BFFF (word address)

big endian, high byte first

header:

01 sector = 128 byte = 0x40 words =
04 sector = 0x100 words
40 sector = 0x1000 words
80 sector = 0x2000 words

           len? addr?
00000000  44 2b 01 80 30 31 30 32  0102  2b sector = 0x0ac0
          44 08 10 00 30 32 31 39  0219  08 sector = 0x0200 words
00000010  44 80 a0 00 30 33 30 31  0301  80 sector = 0x2000 words
          20 18 7c 00 37 34 30 31  7430  18 sector = 0x0600 words  overlay?
00000020  46 00 10 00 00 00 00 00  


compare

track/head/sect

volume label='      '
name='P6FWR4.1'
  01/0/01-07/0/24 create=09.07.1980 expire=None  
name='P6FWO'
  07/0/25-13/0/15 create=09.06.1980 expire=None
name='P6SW4'
  13/0/16-52/0/18 create=09.06.1980 expire=None



dirk@feanor:/mnt/home/dirk/repos/git2/olivetti/p6060/tools$ hexdump -C ../extract/system_2.0/P6FWR2.0 | head -5

00000000  44 30 00 40 30 31 30 32  44 08 10 00 30 32 32 34  |D0.@0102D...0224|
00000010  44 80 a0 00 30 33 30 36  20 10 7c 00 37 34 30 31  |D...0306 .|.7401|
00000020  46 01 10 00 00 00 00 00  ff ff ff ff ff ff ff ff  |F...............|
00000030  ff ff ff ff ff ff ff ff  ff ff ff ff ff ff ff ff  |................|

00000000  44 30 00 40 30 31 30 32  0102  30 sector = 0x0C00 words  0040-1000
          44 08 10 00 30 32 32 34  0224  08 sector = 0x0200 words  1000-1200
00000010  44 80 a0 00 30 33 30 36  0306  80 sector = 0x2000 words  a000-c000
          20 10 7c 00 37 34 30 31  7401  10 sector = 0x0400 words
00000020  46 01 10 00 00 00 00 00                                  1000

first word is addr?
